title: Product Tour: Compensation Planner
description: With inflation, leaner teams, and tighter budgets, there’s a lot at stake this merit cycle. Getting employees aligned on compensation decisions will be more important than ever. Run a seamless, data-driven merit cycle with Pave’s compensation planning and management platform.

title: Product Tour: Advanced Equity
description: Confidently manage your equity program with relevant, real-time benchmarks from Pave. Advanced Equity gives you insight into your peers’ equity practices and market changes so you can distribute equity in a way that’s competitive and responsible.

title: How to Navigate Today’s 3 Big Compensation Challenges
description: Learn how to navigate these challenges from Angela Rao, Director of Total Rewards at Drata, Rahim Bhayani, Field Compensation Advisory at Elastic, Renee Gardner, VP of Global Compensation at Snowflake, and Matt Schulman, CEO of Pave.

title: How CFOs and CPOs Collaborate: Setting and Managing Your Compensation Budget
description: One of the most important but difficult parts of building your People strategy is determining the right budget. You need to consider a range of factors including your compensation philosophy, your company goals, and the happiness of your employees. You’ll also need to factor in your planned promotions, hiring plan, and standard merit increases for strong performers. Spend too much and you’ll be hearing from your board or investors. Spend too little and you’ll have a retention issue. You need to strike the perfect balance. As People and Finance Leaders, it’s your responsibility to come to the table with a proposal that drives the best outcomes.

title: Equity in a Down Market
description: In a down market, there are new realities that People and Finance Leaders face when it comes to equity. First, you have to determine your plan in the very likely scenario that your equity value has changed over the past year or will change with an upcoming fundraise. Second, you also need to consider how to communicate equity changes to your employees. Determining when to share and how much to share will be essential in keeping your workforce confident with their total rewards packages and the company’s future. There’s a lot at stake – so we’ve brought in some equity experts to provide some tactical advice and answer your questions.

title: Navigating Comp and Performance in the New Transparency-first World
description: In this webinar, we’ll sit down with Alexis Merritt, VP of People at Pave and Thaddeus Rada-Bayne, Senior People Scientist at Culture Amp to discuss compensation and performance conversations in today’s increasingly transparent world.

title: How to Build Compensation Bands Using Real-Time Market Data
description: In this session, we’ll explain how salary bands should work, then show you how to pull in the right market data and use it to build salary bands for your entire team.
